org.voltdb.VoltTableRow

    Package Description
    org.voltdb
    Main package for VoltDB contains public interfaces.

    • Uses of VoltTableRow in org.voltdb

      Subclasses of VoltTableRow in org.voltdb 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  VoltTable
      The primary representation of a result set (of tuples) or a temporary table in VoltDB.

      Return a VoltTableRow instance with the specified index.
